My Darling,
You Are The Rock That Withstands Bad Times.

During Good Times.
You Are My Friend,
My Lover, And My All.
Have A Heartfelt Valentine’s Day.

U wa watashi o sakujo shita baai, watashi wa by?ki de yaburu
U wa watashi o hoji suru baai, watashi wa by?ki ni furu
U ga watashi ni watashi by?ki isoide hitsuy?na baai wa,
U wa watashi o yobidashite inai baai, watashi wa by?ki de shinpai
U wa watashi o kizutsukeru baai, watashi wa by?ki ni naku Shikashi
U wa watashi o nokoshite iru baai, watashi wa by?ki de shib? shite imasu.
Shiawasena barentaind? shin’ainaru.

entry.title: Happy Valentines Day 2014 Sms
entry.content:
best Happy Chocolate Day Greetings Wishes Messages For Lover, Girlfriend, Boyfriend

When she came on, you couldn’t keep your seat;
Fighting your way up through the orchestra,
Tup-heavy bumpkin, you confused your feet,
Fell in the drum – how we went ha ha ha!
But once you gained her side and started waltzing
We all began to cheer; the way she leant
Her cheek on yours and laughed was so exalting
We thought you were stooging for the management.
But no. What you did, any of us might.
And saying so I see our difference:
Not your aplomb (I used mine to sit tight),
But fancying you improve her. Where’s the sense
In saying love, but meaning indifference ?
You’ll only change her. Still, I’m sure you’re right.
* Valentine’s Day Poems for Him and Her 2013

best Happy Chocolate Day Greetings Wishes Messages For Lover, Girlfriend, Boyfriend

entry.title: Funny Jokes, Happy Propose Day Sms Messages in Hindi & English & Benga
entry.content:
best Happy Promise Day 2014 HD Sms Backgrounds, Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes

There’s One Sad Truth In Life I’ve Found
While Journeying East And West –
The Only Folks We Really Wound
Are Those We Love The Best.


best Happy Promise Day 2014 HD Sms Backgrounds, Messages, Text Greetings, Quotes

Very little love is lost in living.
A star can fill a universe with light,
Lasting not one second less for giving
Each of us the gift of its delight.
Nor do we love ourselves the less for loving,
Taking others’ pleasures for our own.
In love there is an ecstasy unmoving,
Neither more engaged nor less alone,
Eternal in its house of flesh and bone.

* Valentines Day Greetings 2013

Funny Jokes, Happy Propose Day Sms Messages In Hindi & English & Benga

entry.title: Beautiful Collection on Happy Propose Day 2014 Poetry Poems in Hindi,
entry.content:
best Happy Hug Day Sms 2014

With all the Rose’s Perfume
& with all the lights in the world
& with all the children Smiles…
I Wish U that your all dreams comes True..
HAPPY Perfume Day


best Happy Hug Day Sms 2014

Socha aap say baaat karoon,
Phir soocha, ek mulaqaat karoon,
Phir soocha, kyun na intezaar karoon,
Phir soocha, kyun na ek kaam karoon,
Ek piyaara sa sms aap ke naam karoon,
Happy Valentines Day!

& sorrow & gladness r linked….
Together….

entry.title: Valentines Day Messages Wishes for Facebook
entry.content:
best English’

Girls are not complicated. Seriously. How hard is it to say you’re pretty and give us chocolat

best English’

Okka sari dhagar lekapotte dear
Dear okka sari dhagar lekapotte
Adhi easyga gynapakam pettukovachu
Dhagara okka sari hounte but kani
Chala kastam parichipodaniki dear
Okka sari Happy Valentine’s Day


Valentines Day Messages Wishes For Facebook

TUM POCHO OR HUM NA BATAYN
ASAY TO HALAT NAHI
KISS KO KHABAR THEA SAWALE BADAL BIN BARSE AUR JATE HAIN!
SAWAN AYA LAIKEN ABBB HE KISMAT MAIN BARSAT NAHI!
TOOT GAYA JAB DIL TOO PHER YEAH SANS KHE NAGHME KYA MAHNE!
GONJ RAHE HAI KHUN SHANAYE JAB KHE KOI BAAT NAHI!
GHAM KHE ANDERON MAIN TUJH KO MAIN APNA SA BHE KHUN SAMJHOON!
TO PHER MERA TOO SAYA BHE MARE SATH NAHI!
MARE GHAM GHEEN HONE PER AHBAB HAIN SAB HE HIRAT MAIN!
JAISE PATHAR HO MARE SEENA MAIN JAZBATH NAHI!
GONJ RAHE HAI KHUN SHANAYE JAB KHE KOI BARAT NAHI!
SAWAN AYA LAIKEN APNE KISMAT MAIN BARSAT NHI
0300 2711 588

that u can cant take wit-hout giving,

Missing a person is good thing
as it shows immense love about it.

As–u go 2–bed T2–night,

Telling my angels 2–hug you tight
And make sure you will b–all right,
I asked the gentle breeze 2—kiss u…
